attributes.action: Ban Council Car Park "No change given" DIRTY LITTLE SCAM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Problems with Pay and Display

No Change Given., Dirty Little Scam
Scam Unegotiable, One Sided Unfair
Machines should charge by fairest minimum time periods available for type of machine.
Council always complains that no other machine available or too expensive. This is not true
Price of alternative machines is close to price of none change machines
Price of change machines compared too non change machines only a fraction of illicit gain by council for no change given
Place to receive refund often several miles away , by appointment or for limited hours
Fair transaction should be available at place of transaction
Credit not available for unused time .
Penalty charges far in excess of normal time based parking fee car parks
Extortion , ransom, wheel clamping.
Credit/debit  of a few pence is a few pence. Penalty charges should reflect this and be in reasonable proportion
 And should reflect this without  clamping which is disproportionate and is excessive abuse of power and one sided 
Council excuses, the scam is widespread and if others get away with it then so can they.
(remember the BBC and phone in scam)

This petition is too ban illegal or unfair scam practices by councils
